meanings.definition: A man who is the owner or manager of a business or establishment.
meanings.sent1: The padrone of the restaurant greeted all the guests warmly.
meanings.sent2: The padrone of the store made sure everything was running smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The padrone jokingly declared himself the king of the coffee shop.
meanings.sent4: As the padrone of the shop, he held the keys to success.
meanings.sent5: The padrone's presence in the office was always reassuring.

meanings.definition: A person who exercises control or authority over others.
meanings.sent1: The strict padrone of the household set clear rules for everyone.
meanings.sent2: The padrone of the team motivated everyone to do their best.
meanings.sent3: The padrone playfully challenged his friends to a game of chess.
meanings.sent4: She was the padrone of the dance floor, leading with grace and confidence.
meanings.sent5: The padrone's influence over the group was undeniable.

meanings.sent1: The skilled padrone trained his apprentices with patience.
meanings.sent2: The padrone of the company valued hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent3: The padrone generously rewarded his employees for their efforts.
meanings.sent4: She saw her boss as a padrone of knowledge and experience.
meanings.sent5: The padrone's guidance led the team to success.
